code: import{Box,Select,TextArea,FormField,Button}from'grommet';import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function NewTask(_ref){let{createTask}=_ref;const[status,setStatus]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const handleConfirmCreateTask=()=>{if(status&&description){createTask(status,description);}else{console.log('Invalid input.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{align:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormField,{label:"Status",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Select,{value:status,onChange:_ref2=>{let{option}=_ref2;return setStatus(option);},options:['To Do','In Progress','Done']})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormField,{fill:true,label:"Description",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextArea,{value:description,onChange:event=>setDescription(event.target.value),placeholder:"type here"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{label:"Create Task",onClick:handleConfirmCreateTask})]});}
